category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: DesignContextPickUpNewBackgroundAppearances
preference.preference_description: This indicates whether unselected Background Appearance information would be saved along with the Search Criteria Proximity Filter. Valid values are TRUE/FALSE. A value of TRUE could result in heavy volume of data created and stored in Teamcenter Database. Default value for the preference is FALSE.
